document.full_text: the dallas stars snapped a six-game losing streak with a controversial 4-3 road win over the anaheim ducks sunday, keeping their slim hopes of a playoff place alive.
document.title: stars down ducks to snap nhl losing streak
lines_and_colors: the dallas stars snapped a six-game losing streak with a controversial 4-3 road win over the anaheim ducks sunday, keeping their slim hopes of a playoff place alive.
